posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Johnson (pitching) w/LENOX back SGC 20
posts.post_content:
T-206 Walter Johnson (pitching) w/LENOX back

Grade: SGC 20 (Due to pencil writing on the front, which looks like "1*")

Price: SOLD!!!!

Payment: Check, MO, Paypal (please add 3% if paying via paypal).

Thank you for your consideration.

Card has been SOLD!!! 

Thank you all for the interest.
